thread.title: Steelers sign free agent DL Tyson Alualu
thread.title_full: Steelers sign free agent DL Tyson Alualu

author: Simon A Chester
title: Steelers sign free agent DL Tyson Alualu
text:
The Pittsburgh Steelers may have been somewhat quiet during the opening week of free agency, but they have been more than making up for it the past few days. After coming to terms with two new additions on Monday, the Steelers added another name on Tuesday, agreeing to a two-year deal with defensive lineman Tyson Alualu.
Steelers sign former Jaguars defensive lineman Tyson Alualu, per source. Former top-10 pick gets two-year deal with contender.
â€” Jeremy Fowler (@JFowlerESPN) March 21, 2017 

A former first-round pick of the Jacksonville Jaguars, Alualu should provide depth to the Steelers defensive front. His signing suggest we may have send the end of the Ricardo Mathews era in Pittsburgh.
Related: Where does the signing of Knile Davis leave DeAngelo Williams?
